rename.from: Create meta model with factories document issue

body: Thanks for reporting this we indeed had an issue when deploying the javadoc.

issue.title: doc: remove link to decommissioned Gforge

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

body:
Hiya, 

Do you have any idea when the JavaDocs will be back up on the website? Alternatively have you just got a dropbox (or etc) link for them?

Thanks

For current SNAPSHOT version, this seems to work:
http://spoon.gforge.inria.fr/mvnsites/spoon-core/spoon-core/apidocs/index.html

issue.title: fix(doc): change link to javadoc to adapt the new module organization

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.body:
Alternative to #2826 : Instead of redeploying javadoc to fit the old url, we adapt links.
Fix #2790 

This PR merely conatins the result of
```bash
find doc -name "*.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\/mvnsites\/spoon-core\/api/\/mvnsites\/spoon-core\/spoon-core\/api/g'
```

body:
Fixed see http://spoon.gforge.inria.fr/mvnsites/spoon-core/apidocs/index.html

Thanks for the report
